tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently had the privilege of receiving treatment from Dr. Teja Deepthi, and I am compelled to share my experience. From start to finish, my journey with Dr. Deepthi was nothing short of exceptional.

Upon entering the clinic, I was greeted warmly by the staff, setting a welcoming tone for the entire visit. The atmosphere was calm, clean, and professional, which immediately put me at ease.

Dr. Deepthi is a true expert in her field. Her expertise and passion for endodontics were evident from our initial consultation. She took the time to thoroughly explain my diagnosis and treatment options, answering all of my questions with patience and clarity. Her reassuring demeanor helped alleviate any anxieties I had about the procedure.

During the treatment itself, Dr. Deepthi demonstrated a remarkable level of skill and precision. Her attention to detail was impressive, ensuring that every step of the procedure was executed with the utmost care and precision. Throughout the process, She continuously checked in to ensure my comfort and well-being, which I deeply appreciated.

Not only is Dr. Deepthi highly skilled clinically, but She also possesses a genuine compassion for her patients. She exudes empathy and understanding, making the entire experience as comfortable as possible.

Following the treatment, Dr. Deepthi provided thorough post-operative instructions and follow-up care, ensuring a smooth recovery process.

In conclusion, I cannot recommend Dr. Deepthi highly enough. Her expertise, professionalism, and compassionate approach set her apart as a truly outstanding endodontist. If you're in need of endodontic care, look no further than Dr. Teja Deepthi. You'll be in the best hands possible.

Thank you, Dr. Deepthi, for your exceptional care and commitment to excellence.

Sincerely,
Lakshma

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cavities,Laser Gum Surgery,
review: My experience with Say Cheese Clinic was soothing and easy going treatment. I had very bad oral health , it became better and good after I met Dr.Teja. Before meeting Dr.Teja I have visited 4 Dental doctors in the last 12years, there treatment made my oral health more worse. My front teeth are in zig-zag shape and my 3 corners of teeth are affected with Root canal and crowns were laid which lead to more cavities and gaps between my teeth. Whenever I have my food, food gets stuck in every corner. After meeting Dr.Teja I came to know I have severe gum issues, she explained everything with utmost patience and suggested Laser gum surgery. It took time to heal my gums, now my gums are in proper shape. Then in a step by step process replaced all my previous crowns in 3 corners. Now I have perfect teeth crowns where there is NO food lodging. After years I'm enjoying my after meal experience. I'm really thankful to her lfor the complete treatment. I highly recommend her for any sort of teeth issues. Clinic is very hygienically maintained at all times. Friendly staff, I'm satisfied with the whole treatment. 5 star service and hospitality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Dr Tejadeepthi is a thorough professional and we recently visited the clinic on my friends advice. Due to the covid times I was apprehensive initially to take my parents who were senior citizens. The moment we stepped in the clinic the experience was completely different and the clinic was very hygienic and were following all covid protocols and my parents felt at ease immediately. Doctor took enough time to diagnose and suggest appropriate treatment. Most importantly the personal connect with my parents and regular follow up with them is what impressed me the most. I highly recommend Dr Tejadeepthi gaaru and her team of doctors who are very professional *** ************** They use latest equipments during treatment and ensure it's a painless procedure. Dental problems are the most we as common people ignore....recommend say cheese clinic to all of you and sincere advice not to postpone your dental problems and try to get them treated at the initial stage itself......Thank you Say Chesse....
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback sirüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** **** ********* *** excellent listener --> I went to doctor for tooth ache. X-ray didnt show any cavity for the aching tooth, but the adjacent tooth was broken. She went by my feedback than blindly proceeding with the x-ray and that is when, it was found that a cavity was there in the aching tooth. She explained that root canal needs to be done. Again during the process, she didnt blindly gave me anesthesia but rather was asking me regularly if the RC process was painful. I had no pain and my root canal was done without anesthesia.

Shows excellent profesionalism --> I had appointments in the morning as well as in the late evening also, but whether its 10 AM or 9 PM appointment doctor maintains same energy levels and takes her own time to treat the patient. This is something that is rare in most of the doctors. Doctor has loads of patience and will clarify all the doubts with a smile.

Economical --> Few of my friends told me that their doctor never suggested them different variations of crowns but only the costliest ones. Whereas i was told about different types of crown and was given an option to choose and that too at a very good price. From whatever i have heard in my friend circle, Dr. TejaDeepthi charges relatively less.

Reachable --> Doctor is reachable in case if you need to clarify any doubts with almost no delay.

Overall very happy with Dr. TejaDeepthi. There is no second thought of me recommending the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Deepthi is a friendly doctor *** **** *** ********* ** ********** **** ** ***** I have got a new face. I was smiling with my teeth closed, since there were few missing teeth, and in a group photo, people used to identify my horrid appearance clearly.  but now am so happy, that I can mingle with people easily and willing to take snaps /selfie. Thanks Dr. Deepthi for all your dedicated service

I had also undergone RCT treatment in her clinic without pain. The doctor advised me to take pain killer, in case I had any pain, but it was unbelievably that I didn't experience any pain. Really a marvellous doctor.

Am a physicist and a mathematical modeller. As a researcher, if we need to do such engineering, we really need to do an RPT,scanning and then arrive at the precision. She was able to do it just by looking at the x rays and the measurements through her fingers. I really appreciate her devoted abilities and her experience in doing such measurements.

If she was a cardiologist or a vein specialist, she would have saved several lives, with her precision

Lastly, I came to know from the treatment, that sugar levels starts decreasing with reduced bacterial infection, which I was not able to reduce using allopathic drugs. Am not aware of how, this happens, but to all diabetics, whose sugar levels cannot be brought down, I suggest u to do a complete cavity cleaning to remove the bacterial infection.

Thanks once again Dr. Deepthi
reply_text: Thank you sirüôèfor ur kind wordsüòä

But Deepthi ma'am made the entire process effortless and I was at ease all throughout the treatment. I would recommend Deepthi ma'am without a second thought to all.

review:
** *********** ** ** ********* ****** *** very professional. I would definitely recommend visiting Say chesse dental clinic. She explains everything clearly before the procedure and very patiently listens to whatever the patients have to say. 

I had 2 RCT done along with a few cavity fillings and cleaning. I did not experience any pain during/after the treatment and the treatment was done exceptionally well. I was always very reluctant to visit any dentist as I had a bad experience once but looking at the reviews of her clinic, I decided to go to her for treatment and i am very happy with the results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would very highly recommend Dr. TejaDeepthi for any of your dental needs. She is a thorough professional. Very humble and polite. Spent enough time to understand the issue and then explained the details of the procedure and time it would take. She promptly responded to my call and was readily available at the time of my appointment. She treatment was with utmost dedication and care all the while explaining what she was doing. She also proactively identified a potential future issue and suggested a remedy to avoid root canal. Most of all she is very friendly and made sure the experience is lovely for her patients. An awesome overall experience and now I know why she named her clinic "Say Cheese". Definitely brings a smile throughout the process and even after you left.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Tejadeepthi is a great communicator,has an excellent and calming bedside manner, and as a nervous patient she gave me an excellent, pain-free experience! HIGHLY recommended.She showed fantastic attention to details and a lot of good will while performing a surgery going as far as using extra materials at no charge to ‚Äúget it done properly‚Äù and providing full imageset of actions taken.I honestly could not recommend ma'am enough and I hope she doesn't leave town as long as I am here !  Thank you :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Exceptional doctor. Almost like a friend. 

I had gone for tooth ache but she look at it and said if will come down. Dont do any dental procedure unless really required. Very genuine. 

After that my wife went for RCT, my uncle went for denture change, my driver. Every one went to her. 
RCT was complicated but she handled very well. 
For denture procedure she brought in a specialist and go it all done in record time. Also suggested us to not go for expensive denture as the expensive one was more cosmetic than anything. My uncle is 74 years old and doctor took care of him really well. 

Very very friendly and genuine. Takes the extra effort to explain and make us comfortable. Very clear about the cost the treatment will involve. 

Many times didnt even charge consultation fees.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Tejadeepthi is an energetic and friendly person. She is very thorough in explaining the cause, treatment options and expected recovery time. She performed an RCT on my upper left molar and the entire process went smoothly. After the treatment, she used to enquire about the recovery proactively. She has very steady hands and tries to make the procedure as painless as possible. I initially faced some discomfort after the lower wisdom tooth extraction, but she was prompt ** *********** ********* ******** which eventually helped in speedy recovery. I would recommend her for any kind of dental issues.
